channel.title: open access on Ryan Moodie
channel.description: Recent content in open access on Ryan Moodie

item.title: Publication: NLO gluon fusion to diphoton plus jet cross sections
item.description: Following the arXiv release, the open access version of our paper Next-to-leading order QCD corrections to diphoton-plus-jet production through gluon fusion at the LHC was published online in Physics Letters B today.

item.title: Publication: gluon fusion to diphoton plus jet amplitude at two loops
item.description: Following the arXiv release, our paper Virtual QCD corrections to gluon-initiated diphoton plus jet production at hadron colliders was published by the Journal of High Energy Physics today.

item.title: Publication: gluon fusion to diphoton plus jets with amplitude neural networks
item.description: Following the preprint release, our paper Optimising simulations for diphoton production at hadron colliders using amplitude neural networks was published by the Journal of High Energy Physics today.
